page.title: 05ASPULL CIVIC CENTRE.
page.content: Aspull Civic Centre,built about twelve years ago is a place for leisure activities.Ballroom dancing takes place every week and also Morris Dancing for people of all ages.There is a youth club for 12 to 16 year olds.Different kinds of night school classes are held there.Sometimes there are concerts, discos,meetings and exhibitons. Out side there are four tennis courts,a bowling green,a putting green,cricket nets and a pitch and a football field. Aspull victoria football team and Civic Centre football team play their matches there.There is also a cricket team.
